22-0158.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Housing Authority of the City of Long Beach, California Regular Meeting held Tuesday,January 18, 2022.Page 1 of 3TELECONFERENCE, 4:30 PMTUESDAY, FEBRUARY 8, 2022CITY OF LONG BEACHHOUSING AUTHORITY OF THE CITY OF LONG BEACH, CALIFORNIA MINUTESA motion was made by Commissioner Richardson, seconded by Vice Chair Saro, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and Zendejas2.

22-0159.summary: Recommendation to receive and file an updated Housing Authority Financial and Operational Performance Reports for September 2021.  (Citywide)A motion was made by Commissioner Richardson, seconded by Commissioner Allen, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Yes: 10 - Allen, Price, Supernaw, Mungo, Uranga, Austin, Richardson, Tanzer, Saro and Zendejas3.
